thread.title: 4 tech companies in race to make car of the future
thread.title_full: 4 tech companies in race to make car of the future

title: 4 tech companies in race to make car of the future
text:
4 tech companies in race to make car of the future 
Times of India Friday 23rd October, 2015 
1. 
Google Google, now Alphabet, has spent six years working on cars that can drive without human assistance. But the company says it doesn't want the responsibility of building the robotic vehicles. Instead, it plans to make the self-driving system available to automakers that already have factories, dealerships and experience. 
"We have enormous respect for the expertise of the automotive industry and how big and complex a job it is to manufacture a vehicle," company spokeswoman Courtney Hohne said. "We'll partner with many different companies to bring this technology into the world...
